text:
We are looking for an awesome developer to help our team build on our tech stack, with HubSpot in the center.

Is that you? :partying_face:

Note 1: I am not the hiring manager, but the role is in the team I am in

Note 2: Remote is perfectly fine

Note 3: NO agencies, no recruiters

<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/3707369417/?refId=1MXZRd%2B9Q%2FGmtcxlPsPS4Q%3D%3D&trackingId=1MXZRd%2B9Q%2FGmtcxlPsPS4Q%3D%3D>
Hi all, looking for someone ASAP who can help writing Apex Code for PDF generation, preview and attachment for a custom object, as well as help writing the Visual Force page in Salesforce?
:wave:Hi! Can You recommend an experienced HubSpot dev, who could help me refresh my website? I would be grateful for any recommendations.

I have expertise in developing email templates, landing pages, themes, blogs, and modules in HubSpot.
HubSpot Website Developed For Clients:
<https://mco.mycomplianceoffice.com/>
<https://www.u-nica.com/>
<https://www.kardiachain.io/>. ( WordPress to HubSpot Migration )
<https://www.tsffinance.co.uk/> ( WordPress to HubSpot Migration )
